title: The S&P 500 beat both Dow, and Nasdaq in 2021 by the widest margin in 24 years. Here's what history says happens in 2022.
text:
Wall Street analysts' favorite stocks for 2022 include Alaska Air, Caesars and Lithia Motors

General Motors, Salesforce and PayPal are among the 20 S&P 500 stocks that analysts both heavily favor and expect to rise to the most. See full story.

How frequently should you be checking your portfolio? See full story.

These are tech's 10 megatrends for 2022 — and the stocks to buy

From cloud computing to autonomous vehicles to 5G, here's what to watch. See full story.

So much of retirement planning is wishful thinking — what I've learned after 3 years of actually being retired
